DoubleVectorProperty.name: ViewTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The pipeline update time for this view. This gets passed to all representations added to this view.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CacheKey
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This is the cache key used to indentify which cache entry to use for rendering when caching is enabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCache
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Indicates whether to use cache for subsequent renderings.

IntVectorProperty.name: ViewPosition
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the position on this view in the multiview configuration.

IntVectorProperty.name: ViewSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the size of this view in the multiview configuration.

RenderViewProxy.label: Render View
RenderViewProxy.name: RenderView
RenderViewProxy.Documentation: View proxy for a 3D interactive render view.

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowAnnotation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether to see annotation providing advanced debugging and performance information about each render.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseOffscreenRendering
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether to use offscreen rendering.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseOffscreenRenderingForScreenshots
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether offscreen rendering should be used during CaptureWindow calls.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseInteractiveRenderingForScreenshots
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether InteractiveRender() should be used during CaptureWindow calls. Default is to use StillRender().

IntVectorProperty.name: StillRenderImageReductionFactor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/Set the reduction-factor to use when for StillRender(). This is typically set to 1, but in some cases with terrible connectivity or really large displays, one may want to use a sub-sampled image even for StillRender(). This is set it number of pixels to be sub-sampled by. Note that image reduction factors have no effect when in built-in mode.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CollectGeometryThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: DEPRECATED: Simply set UseOutlineForLODRendering flag to true, and whenever LOD rendering is employed, we rendering outlines, is possible.

IntVectorProperty.name: ImageReductionFactor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/Set the reduction-factor to use when for InteractiveRender(). This is set it number of pixels to be sub-sampled by. Note that image reduction factors have no effect when in built-in mode.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RemoteRenderThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The threshold used to determine if the compositing should be used for rendering. The value is rendering-geometry size in MBs.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LODThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the memory size threshold above which LOD will be used while rendering interactively. The value is rendering-geometry size in MBs.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LODResolution
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the LOD resolution. 0 implies lowest level or detail, while 1 implies maximum level of detail.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseOutlineForLODRendering
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true, this overrides the LODResolution. In that case, when using LOD for rendering, if possible, the data is rendered as outlines.

StringVectorProperty.name: CompressorConfig
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Used to configure the image compression used for client-server image transfer when doing interactive renders.

IntVectorProperty.name: CenterAxesVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle the visibility of the axes showing the center of rotation in the scene.

IntVectorProperty.name: OrientationAxesVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle the visibility of the axes showing the viewing direction.

IntVectorProperty.name: OrientationAxesInteractivity
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Allows repositioning of the orientation axes.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CenterOfRotation
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Center of rotation for the interactor.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: NonInteractiveRenderDelay
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the delay (in seconds) after an interactive render before switching to a full-rese render.

IntVectorProperty.name: Camera3DManipulators
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the interactions mode for 3D interaction. The values are specified in order as (left button, middle button, right button), and repeated for shift key and control key modifiers.

IntVectorProperty.name: Camera2DManipulators
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the interactions mode for 2D interaction. The values are specified in order as (left button, middle button, right button), and repeated for shift key and control key modifiers.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseLight
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable the LightKit.

IntVectorProperty.name: LightSwitch
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn on/off the default light in the 3D renderer.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaximumNumberOfPeels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: In case of depth peeling, define the maximum number of peeling layers. Initial value is 4. A special value of 0 means no maximum limit. It has to be a positive value.

ProxyProperty.name: HiddenRepresentations
ProxyProperty.Documentation: This property is meant for adding/removing representation secretly. e.g. 3D widgets etc. This property is not saved in states nor it recorded by undo-redo.

ProxyProperty.name: HiddenProps
ProxyProperty.Documentation: This property is meant for adding/removing props secretly. e.g. 3D widgets etc. This property is not saved in states nor it recorded by undo-redo.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: PVRepresentationBase
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: ParaView's default representation for showing any type of dataset in the render view.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: ForceUseCache
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ForcedCacheKey
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

IntVectorProperty.name: SelectionVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for the selection, if any.

IntVectorProperty.name: CubeAxesVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for the cube axes.

StringVectorProperty.name: RepresentationTypesInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property that lists the available representation types. This is used by the domain for "Representation" to setup the list of types available correctly.

StringVectorProperty.name: Representation
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the type for the representation.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: GeometryRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: ParaView's default representation for showing any type of dataset in the render view.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: UnstructuredGridBaseRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: This representation is used to show unstructured grid as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe/Volume

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: UnstructuredGridRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: This representation is used to show unstructured grid as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe/Volume

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: StructuredGridRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: This representation is used to show structured grid as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe/Volume

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: UniformGridRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: This representation is used to show image data as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe/Volume/Slice.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: AMRRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: This representation is used to show AMR data as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe/Volume.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

RepresentationProxy.name: OutlineRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation for showing an outline for any dataset.

RepresentationProxy.name: ImageSliceRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation to show 2D images. If the input image has 3D extents, then this representation shows a single Z slice.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation. Must be a vtkImageData producer.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: ForceUseCache
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ForcedCacheKey
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array to color with. One must specify the field association and the array name of the array. If the array is missing, scalar coloring will automatically be disabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: Slice
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current slice number. Slice number is used to load a 2D slice from a 3D input image. If the input image is 2D, then the slice number if ignored. The direction of the slice is determined by SliceMode.

IntVectorProperty.label: Slice Direction
IntVectorProperty.name: SliceMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Determines the direction of slicing to obtain a 2D slice from a 3D image.

IntVectorProperty.name: MapScalars
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true, LookupTable will always be used for scalar mapping even when scalars are unsigned chars. Otherwise, when upto 4 component unsigned chars are present, they will be directly used as colors.

ProxyProperty.name: LookupTable
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the lookup table to use for scalar mapping.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseXYPlane
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, the image slice is always rendered in the XY plane (Z==0) irrespective of the image bounds. Default if Off.

RepresentationProxy.name: SurfaceRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation to show any dataset in a 3D render view.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: BackfaceRepresentation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the representation type for the backface.

RepresentationProxy.name: Glyph3DRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation to show any dataset in a 3D render view.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: MeshVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/Set the visibility of the original mesh.

IntVectorProperty.name: Scaling
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable scaling of source geometry.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ScaleFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property will be used as a multiplier for scaling the glyphs before adding them to the output.

IntVectorProperty.name: Orient
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 1, the glyphs will be oriented based on the selected orientation vector array.

IntVectorProperty.name: OrientationMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Orientation mode indicates if the OrientationArray provides the direction vector for the orientation or the rotations around each axes. Default is DIRECTION.

IntVectorProperty.name: Masking
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Tells the mapper to skip glyphing input points that haves false values in the mask array. If there is no mask array (id access mode is set and there is no such id, or array name access mode is set and the there is no such name), masking is silently ignored. A mask array is a vtkBitArray with only one component.

RepresentationProxy.name: CubeAxesRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: CubeAxesRepresentation is a representation for any dataobject which simply shows an axes along the bounding box of the dataobject.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: FlyMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify a mode to control how the axes are drawn: either static, closest triad, furthest triad or outer edges in relation to the camera position.

IntVectorProperty.name: GridLineLocation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify a mode to control how the grid lines of the axes are drawn: either on the closest faces, furthest faces or on all the faces in relation to the camera position.

IntVectorProperty.name: Inertia
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the inertial factor that controls how often (i.e, how many renders) the axes can switch position (jump from one axes to another).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CornerOffset
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify an offset value to "pull back" the axes from the corner at which they are joined to avoid overlap of axes labels. The "CornerOffset" is the fraction of the axis length to pull back.

StringVectorProperty.name: XTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title for the X axis.

StringVectorProperty.name: YTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title for the Y axis.

StringVectorProperty.name: ZTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title for the Z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseDefaultXTitle
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if X axis title should use any provided title.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseDefaultYTitle
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if Y axis title should use any provided title.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseDefaultZTitle
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if Z axis title should use any provided title.

IntVectorProperty.name: XAxisVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if X axis is visible.

IntVectorProperty.name: YAxisVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if Y axis is visible.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZAxisVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if Z axis is visible.

IntVectorProperty.name: XAxisTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if ticks are visible on the X axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: YAxisTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if ticks are visible on the Y axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZAxisTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if ticks are visible on the Z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: XAxisMinorTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if minor ticks are visible on the X axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: YAxisMinorTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if minor ticks are visible on the Y axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZAxisMinorTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if minor ticks are visible on the Z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: XGridLines
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if grid lines are drawn parallel to X axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: YGridLines
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if grid lines are drawn parallel to Y axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZGridLines
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if grid lines are drawn parallel to Z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: TickLocation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the location of tick marks.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseAxesOrigin
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if the AxesCenter should be used to draw the axes.

IntVectorProperty.name: StickyAxes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Adjust the axes to always be visible in the viewport unless the original bounds of the axes are entirely outside the viewport.

IntVectorProperty.name: CenterStickyAxes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Keep the sticky axes centered in the view window.

RepresentationProxy.name: DataLabelRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation used to add labels to points/cells of any dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointLabelFormat
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This should be a printf-style format string. By default, the mapper will try to print each component of the tuple using a sane format: d for integers, f for floats, g for doubles, ld for longs, et cetera. If you need a different format, set it here. You can do things like limit the number of significant digits, add prefixes/suffixes, basically anything that printf can do.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellLabelFormat
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This should be a printf-style format string. By default, the mapper will try to print each component of the tuple using a sane format: d for integers, f for floats, g for doubles, ld for longs, et cetera. If you need a different format, set it here. You can do things like limit the number of significant digits, add prefixes/suffixes, basically anything that printf can do.

RepresentationProxy.name: SelectionRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Proxy to show a selection as geometry.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/Set the visibility of the representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: ForceUseCache
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ForcedCacheKey
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UserTransform
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: In addition to the instance variables such as position and orientation, you can add an additional transformation for your own use. This transformation is concatenated with the actor's internal transformation, which you implicitly create through the use of Position, Origin, Orientation. The value is 4x4 matrix for the linear tranform to use.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input molecule for the representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

RepresentationProxy.name: AMROutlineRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation for showing an outline for AMR dataset that is streaming capable.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

RepresentationProxy.name: SurfaceRepresentationBase
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation to show any dataset in a 3D render view.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/Set the visibility of the representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: ForceUseCache
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ForcedCacheKey
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array to color with. One must specify the field association and the array name of the array. If the array is missing, scalar coloring will automatically be disabled.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EdgeColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the edge color. This color is used to draw the edge for the polygonal data when EdgeVisibility is on.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UserTransform
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: In addition to the instance variables such as position and orientation, you can add an additional transformation for your own use. This transformation is concatenated with the actor's internal transformation, which you implicitly create through the use of Position, Origin, Orientation. The value is 4x4 matrix for the linear tranform to use.

ProxyProperty.name: LookupTable
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the lookup-table to use to map data array to colors. Lookuptable is only used with MapScalars to ON.

IntVectorProperty.name: MapScalars
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true, LookupTable will always be used for scalar mapping even when scalars are unsigned chars. Otherwise, when upto 4 component unsigned chars are present, they will be directly used as colors.

IntVectorProperty.name: InterpolateScalarsBeforeMapping
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true (default), texture coordinates are sent to and interpolated by the graphics card. This is equivalent with interpolating scalars and then mapping them to obtain colors between points. Otherwise, colors are sent to and interpolated by the graphics card.

IntVectorProperty.name: BlockVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for a block. Value is (property, visibility).

DoubleMapProperty.name: BlockColor
DoubleMapProperty.Documentation: Set the color for a block. Value is (index, r, g, b).

DoubleMapProperty.name: BlockOpacity
DoubleMapProperty.Documentation: Set the opacity for a block. Value is (index, alpha).
